T02D3108:204a-1: aushn'i sha bha ba si t'a ta pa tre bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D3108:204a-3: gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D3108:204a-4: rje btsun phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3108:204a-5: rnam snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags //
T02D3108:204a-6: phyag stong spyan stong zhabs btud nas //
T02D3108:204a-7: gzungs kyi rim pa las byung ba'i //
T02D3108:204a-8: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D3108:204a-14: yid dang mthun pa'i yul dben pa bas mtha'i dgon par /
T02D3108:204a-15: slob dpon gtsug lag mkhas pa chos la dga' ba bslab pa bsrung ba 'grogs na bde ba /
T02D3108:204a-16: snying rje can gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba
T02D3108:204a-17: thob pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las la mkhas
T02D3108:204a-18: pa rmi lam du rtags dang mtshan ma thob pa
T02D3108:204a-19: / sgrub pa'i grogs po rigs btsun pa chos spyod
T02D3108:204a-20: pa dad pa can snying stobs che zhing brtson 'grus
T02D3108:204a-21: / can ; bsam pa bzang zhing mi skyo ba
T02D3108:204a-22: gzhan gyis brid kyang 'phags pa'i tshul mi gtong ba'i
T02D3108:204a-23: grogs dang lhan cig tu stan bde ba la 'dug
T02D3108:204a-24: / can ; ste / sgrub pa'i yan lag ni rdzas me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang /
T02D3108:204a-25: rtsa ba dang sdong bu la sogs pa sbyar ba'i spos dkar po dang /
T02D3108:204a-28: lug la sogs pa dkar ba las byung ba mar gyi mar me dang /
T02D3108:204a-31: me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i aargham dang /
T02D3108:204a-32: gtsug tor dkar mo'i nye ba'i snying po bzlas pa'i khrus byas la /
T02D3108:204a-34: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dkar po bgos nas /
T02D3108:204a-35: gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin tshogs gsog pa'i lha mdun du spyan drangs la /
T02D3108:204a-37: gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin du khro mo bcu
T02D3108:204a-38: bdun bsgoms la sngags bcu gsum brjod nas thugs ka'i
T02D3108:204a-39: 'od zer las ra ba dang dra ba dang /
T02D3108:204a-40: bla re dang me 'od rnams byung ste bsrung bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D3108:204a-41: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge h'um bkod
T02D3108:204a-42: nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o
T02D3108:204a-43: // de nas dbyangs yig bcu drug las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D3108:204a-44: de'i steng du yi ge h'um bsam mo //
T02D3108:204b-0: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dkar po @204b rtse dgu ba bsam mo //
T02D3108:204b-1: de nas 'od zer spha ra na h'um zhes pas spro ba dang /
T02D3108:204b-2: sam ha ra na h'um zhes pas bsdus nas /
T02D3108:204b-3: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D3108:204b-4: bgegs kyi rgyal po bi n'a ya ka gdan du bting ba /
T02D3108:204b-5: sku mdog sngon po sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can /
T02D3108:204b-6: rdo rje'i rgyan gyes brgyan pa me'i phung po'i dbus na bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D3108:204b-7: de'i snying ga nas nye ba'i snying po'i sngags brjod
T02D3108:204b-8: pas shar la sogs pa me 'bar ma la sogs
T02D3108:204b-9: pa'i khro mo brgyad sbrul pa h'um drum hr'i: shtom
T02D3108:204b-10: gyis bdag dang khro mo brgyad byin gyis brlabs la
T02D3108:204b-11: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bzlas nas /
T02D3108:204b-12: de'i mdun du gdug pa can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor dbu stong mnga' ba /
T02D3108:204b-14: spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba /
T02D3108:204b-15: mi byed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can 'grel pa nas 'byung ba bzhin bsgoms la /
T02D3108:204b-17: gtsug tor dkar mo'i gzungs kyis bstod pa dang /
T02D3108:204b-18: bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad srung du gsol zhes phrin las bcol la /
T02D3108:204b-19: snying po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs skyong ba bcus bskor bar bsams la /
T02D3108:204b-20: gtor ma bcu dbul ba dang /
T02D3108:204b-21: gdon thams cad la gtor ma gsum mkha' spyod dang /
T02D3108:204b-22: sa spyod dang sa 'og na spyod pa'i dbye bas
T02D3108:204b-23: phye ba la mchod pa phul nas gzungs nas 'byung
T02D3108:204b-24: ba bzhin du phrin las bcol la gshegs su gsol
T02D3108:204b-26: de nas nye ba'i snying po'i 'khrul 'khor bris la rgyal rigs la sogs pa la gdags so //
T02D3108:204b-27: yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong dam grong khyer ram /
T02D3108:204b-28: grong rdal gyi sgor btsugs te /
T02D3108:204b-29: klog pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag la mchod pa chen po byas la /
T02D3108:204b-30: bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya ba'am /
T02D3108:204b-31: yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal la /
T02D3108:204b-33: las 'di thams cad la snying bo dang nye ba'i snying po 'bum sngon du bzlas te /
T02D3108:204b-34: gzungs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la tshon dkar pos dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02D3108:204b-35: mchod nas las thams cad shes par bya'o //
T02D3108:204b-36: gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gyi
T02D3108:204b-37: gzungs 'don pa'i cho ga / slob dpon sh'u ram
